Did you know that I like Unicorns? Want to know more? Start the tour!

I WRITE CODE FOR FOOD

My current day job involves writing code usually in C# for Magenic Manila but I've also worked for Gurango Software and BlastAsia in the past. I've been working as a Silverlight Integrator for 5 years until November 2013. At the time of this writing, I'm getting back to web development. I have this new found love for all things HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and iOS development.

View my LinkedIn profile


I know about UX too!

I DO UX DESIGN

There is a lot of misconception with UX Design, most of the time confused with UI Design. The UI is but a part of the whole experience. 'UX Design' means designing an experience which brings together the company, the product, and the service.

My main responsibilities are doing Workflows, Wireframes, and Reasearch. Drawing pretty unicorns is not a required skill in UX Design.


One product coming right up!

I HEART PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT

I've always been a fan of Product Development. I've been lucky to be part of the early stages of Xamun when I worked in BlastAsia and since then I was hooked with PD.

Watch out for Travel Juan and Wufenmau!


Oh, did you know that I have an affinity with music?

MUSIC HELPS ME MAINTAIN MY SANITY

I've been playing with (singing for) bands since highschool. I've been with Sakura Beat, El Guitarista, Batang Tumutunog, and Nimbus Crowd.

Some of the artists in my playlist are Mind's Eye, The Dawn, Gin Blossoms, Mr. Big, Toe, Hiromi Uehara, Winery Dogs, Audioslave, L'Arc~en~Ciel, Circus Maximus.

Sound body, sound mind!

I AM A MARTIAL ARTS FAN

My dad taught me the basics of Boxing when I was in elementary. I did Taekwondo back in highschool up to some point college. I got to do Yaw-yan Fervillion for a few months around 3 years ago.

I currently do Boxing and Muay Thai at FitBox Technogym.
